info.task: navigate to checked menuitemcheckbox in submenu
info.title: Navigate to checked menu item checkbox

setupScript.name: focusonstylecolor
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Style/Color' menu item
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the "Style/Color" menu item
testPageDocument.querySelectorAll('[role=menuitem]')[1].focus();

user: Navigate to 'Italic' menu item and check it by pressing enter. (the menu will close.)
instructions.raw:
Open "Style/Color" menu with down arrow. | 
Navigate to 'Italic' menu item and check it by pressing enter. (the menu will close.) | 
Re-open "Style/Color" menu with down arrow. | 
Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menu are conveyed
The name and role of the 'Font Style' group are conveyed
